Text: this is VERY nice quality! it is obviously from the BDs, and by far the best download available for the series. dvd versions are extremely muddy by comparison.

however, the encoding tools appear to have softened the colors a tiny bit. also, its panned in a little, so that about 5px are missing from all the borders, compared to the original bluray. {i used episode 27 to compare}
this doesnt affect the quality very much, but it does make it less than perfect.
